tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "AF605F344875348E1AD7458E72FB4FAA", "Processing Stations are used to turn raw materials into crafting materials. There are 9 Processing Professions each with their own stations and recipe lists.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "DBC87D254B701DB889E47495189AE7C4", "Processing Stations use Fuel to process items in batches. A Station can run automatically, so you can set up your processing jobs and come back later to pick up your goods.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "B8669A564A5211132CC31E92B71A1DAB", "What you can craft is determined by your level in a given Profession. You can level up your skill in a profession by successfully processing raw materials.")
